short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy selected text or the title of a tab to the clipboard as either a rich-text hyperlink or a markdown link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Rich Text Copy" enhances your browsing and content-sharing experience. With just a single click, it effortlessly combines the selected text or the current tab's title with its URL to produce a rich text link or a markdown link.

Source: https://github.com/shimo164/rich-text-copy
